question_content.description:
### Problem16

The TOY machine has _____(0)\___ words of main memory, _____(1)\___ registers, and _____(2)\___-bit instructions. 

There are _____(3)\___ different instruction types; each one is designated by one of the opcodes _____(4)\___ through _____(5)\___.
question_content.author: Yike Guo
